title: about us
text: We, a team led by Vidya Shankar Chakravarthy have been engaging with children, youth and families in areas of **Child Rights, Education and Teacher Training** since 1999..

title: preschool ratings
text: Focused entirely on our **Holistic Child-focused Vision**, we offer pathbreaking "School Ratings" for **parents to evaluate preschools** with assurance and confidence..
